text:
Butterfly Network | NY | On-site, Full-time | Biotech/AI | | https://www.butterflynetwork.com/

We're a rapidly growing, innovative, extremely well-funded start-up, that is changing the landscape of IoT/medicine. As we grow, we're seeking experienced engineers to help build & take ownership of several aspects of our cloud architecture, design and build visually beautiful iOS and android apps for our future products or develop new machine learning algorithms while also having a direct and immense, real-world impact.

If you love being surrounded by top engineers, scientists and researchers, we'd love to hear from you!

Open roles:

• Engineering manager (cloud)

• Senior Full-stack Engineer

• Senior DevOps Engineer

• Senior / Principal Android Engineer

• Senior iOS Developer

• Senior Product Designer

• Chief Information Security Officer

• Product Manager

• QA Engineer

And more! Feel free to check our website (butterflynetwork.com) for more details or send me an email at: mgorodnichenko@4catalyzer.com
